creator: ehsaliba@uncc.edu
text:
Hi,

One of the applications I am trying to install requires Apache 2.0.48 and
Tomcat 5.0.25 but having a problem locating the appropriate Tomcat
Connector (mod_jk2.so) for it. So far, I've downloaded several versions
of the source code off the archives but none of them seem to work.

Any suggestions on where can I get either the Tomcat Connector binary or
the source code that'll work with both would be grealty appreciated.

Thanks.

JK2 is deprecated and no further development will took place.
Use JK instead
see: 
http://tomcat.apache.org/connectors-doc/news/20041100.html#20041115.1
creator: mturk@apache.org
